effect.then: From Wikiversity, the sixth sense is another term for extrasensory perception (ESP). ESP would involve the reception of information not gained through the recognized senses and not internally originated.
According to the National Science Foundation extrasensory perception is listed as pseudoscience.
From Google, the sixth sense is a supposed intuitive faculty giving awareness not explicable in terms of normal perception.
In brief, it refers to our sight, smell, taste, touch and hearing.
